content: Any date depicting a holiday, but specifically 04 July and 01 Nov. The roads are just too littered with drunk and the suburbs too packed with teenagers puking in yards. You know how we have an "Extreme DUI" clause (.015 or above)? Well I say we extend that a bit and anyone arrested on a holiday gets a higher mandatory minimum sentence. Too many idiots out there. It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

Sullivan013 quote: Originally posted by OldArmyLove: When you think about it, pray for me. This is a tough week on me. Bruce Let us not forget Specialist Four Stephen Allison Allsopp, casualty of the Vietnam War. As a member of the Army Selective Service, 1st Log Command SP4 Allsopp served our country until 06 May 1968 in Binh Dinh, South Vietnam. He was 21 years old and was not married. Hostile, ground casualty, his body was recovered. Stephen was born on 02 January 1947 in New York, New York. SP4 Allsopp is on panel 55E, Line 038 of the Vietnam Memorial Wall in Washington D.C. He served our country for one year. + + + choose joy each day

content: What's wrong with Cinco de Mayo? We have Mexican neighbors. He is a cabinet maker, his wife is a homemaker, they have 4 children, they are well behaved. She keeps the house clean and orderly, the oldest son mows the grass regularly. The husband, gardens and maintains the house, inside and out, repairs and modifications! Cinco de Mayo is a holiday celebration, they earned and have a right to celebrate!@ Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: What's wrong with Cinco de Mayo? We have Mexican neighbors. He is a cabinet maker, his wife is a homemaker, they have 4 children, they are well behaved. She keeps the house clean and orderly, the oldest son mows the grass regularly. The husband, gardens and maintains the house, inside and out, repairs and modifications! Cinco de Mayo is a holiday celebration, they earned and have a right to celebrate!@ Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
